cmp: 到 (to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive)
mng: to fall, to collapse, to overthrow, to fail, to go bankrupt, to change (trains or buses), to move around, to resell at a profit
to place upside down, to invert, to pour, to throw out, to move backwards, however, actually, as a matter of fact, contrary to expectation
